thread.title: Brown scores with 4:32 left to lift Lightning to 3-2 win
thread.title_full: Brown scores with 4:32 left to lift Lightning to 3-2 win

title: Brown scores with 4:32 left to lift Lightning to 3-2 win
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Brown scores with 4:32 left to lift Lightning to 3-2 win J.T. Brown scored with 4:32 left, to lift the Lightning to a 3-2 preseason win over the Dallas Stars. Post to Facebook Brown scores with 4:32 left to lift Lightning to 3-2 win J.T. Brown scored with 4:32 left, to lift the Lightning to a 3-2 preseason win over the Dallas Stars. Check out this story on wtsp.com: http://on.wtsp.com/1FK94Bl Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Brown scores with 4:32 left to lift Lightning to 3-2 win Associated Press, AP 12:43 a.m. EDT October 2, 2015 Lightning right wing J.T. Brown scored late to beat the Dallas Stars. (Photo: Reinhold Matay-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Tampa, FL -- J.T. Brown broke a tie with 4:32 left, and Ben Bishop made 23 saves in the Tampa Bay Lightning's 3-2 victory over the Dallas Stars. 
Nikita Kucherov and Valtteri Filppula also scored for Tampa Bay. 
Curtis McKenzie and Valeri Nichushkin scored for Dallas, and Karin Lehtonen made 21 saves. Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1FK94Bl TOP VIDEOS
